## Introduction

This is a simple example of a Jupyter Notebook written in R.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Setup chunk for R
library(ggplot2)
```

Data Visualization
Let's create a scatter plot using the iris dataset.
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Scatter plot
ggplot(iris, aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width, color = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Scatter Plot of Sepal Length and Width",
       x = "Sepal Length",
       y = "Sepal Width")
```
Summary Statistics
Now, let's display summary statistics of the mtcars dataset.

```{r}
# Summary statistics
summary(mtcars)

```
